# amount

**Instance Property**

The monetary amount associated with the currency.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var amount: NSDecimalNumber? { get }
```

## Discussion

This value in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCurrencyAmount/currencyCode] property determines the currency designator applied to this number.

## Getting the Currency Information

- **currencyCode**: The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to the monetary amount.
